sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词均含"在……上"之意。
means: above ：一般指位置高于某物，但不一定在正上方，也不接触另一物，其反义词是below。
on ：指与另一物表面相接触。
over ：指一物在另一物的垂直上方，多暗示悬空，但也含"覆盖于……之上"之意。其反义词是under。

sentence.Network_en: That big high-rise above us is where Brian lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们上面的那座摩天大楼就是布赖恩住的地方。

sentence.Network_en: Then there was a woman's voice, rising shrilly above the barking.
sentence.Network_cn: 接着，一个女人的尖厉声音盖过了犬吠声。

sentence.Network_en: He had to have one leg amputated above the knee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的一条腿不得不从膝部以上截断。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 那些说到心坎里的伤感说说_Tencent Weibo ... 【below】 在下面； 【above】 超过，在...上面； 【round/around】 四处，在...周围；.
那些说到心坎里的伤感说说_Tencent Weibo ... 【below】 在下面； 【above】 超过，在...上面； 【round/around】 四处，在...周围；.
上字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 上门〖 call;visit〗 上面〖 above〗 上命〖 orderoftheboss〗.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... about prep. 关于；在…周围 above prep. 在…上面；高于 abroad ad. (在)国外；到处.

list.abs: 大学英语四级常用词组 ... be about to 即将(做) above all 首先，首要，尤其是 be absorbed in 专心致力于….
大学英语四级常用词组 ... a series of 一系列,一连串 above all 首先,尤其是 after all 毕竟,究竟.
考博英语词组 ... a word in one’s ear 私房话, 秘密话 above normal 高于正常(温度) act as 扮演.
初中英语总复习_百度知道 ... a wet blanket 扫兴的人 above board 光明正大的 absent-minded professor 无头苍蝇;做事心不在焉者.
英语常用搭配 ... A to Z 从头至尾 above somebody 深奥 all ears 全神贯注地倾听着.

lj.lj_ly: he was concerned above all to speak the truth.

lj.lj_ls: 树枝从头顶上雨一般落下。

phrase.cizu_name: not be above over and above

jx.jx_en_mean: be capable of stooping to (an unworthy act)

lj.lj_ly: he was not above practical jokes.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  abufan (as an adverb), from a- 'on' + bufan (from bi 'by' + ufan 'above')

entry.def: If one thing is above another one, it is directly over it or higher than it.

example.ex: He lifted his hands above his head...
Apartment 46 was a quiet apartment, unlike the one above it...
example.tran: 和它楼上的那间不同，46号公寓很安静。

entry.def: In writing, you use above to refer to something that has already been mentioned or discussed.

example.ex: Several conclusions could be drawn from the results described above...
example.tran: 从上文描述的结果中可以得出几个结论。

example.ex: Full details are in the table above.
example.tran: 详细信息请见上文表格。

entry.def: If an amount or measurement is above a particular level, it is greater than that level.

example.ex: The temperature crept up to just above 40 degrees...
Victoria Falls has had above average levels of rainfall this year...
example.tran: 维多利亚瀑布今年的降雨量超过了平均水平。

entry.def: If you hear one sound above another, it is louder or clearer than the second one.

example.tran: 努力使说话声高过噪音

example.ex: Then there was a woman's voice, rising shrilly above the barking.
example.tran: 接着，一个女人的尖厉声音盖过了犬吠声。

entry.def: If someone is above you, they are in a higher social position than you or in a position of authority over you.

example.ex: I know you're above me socially, but I must say I find your attitude offensive...
example.tran: 我明白你的社会地位比我高，但我得说我觉得你的态度很粗鲁。

example.ex: I married above myself — rich county people...
example.tran: 我高攀了一门亲事，是县里的富有人家。

entry.def: If you say that someone is getting above themself, you disapprove of them because they think they are better than everyone else.

example.ex: I just think you're getting a little bit above yourself.
example.tran: 我只是觉得你变得有点自视过高。

entry.def: If you say that someone thinks they are above something, you mean that they act as if they are too good or important for it.

example.ex: This was clearly a failure by someone who thought he was above failure...
example.tran: 这显然是认为自己根本不会失败的人所遭遇的一次失败。

example.ex: I'm not above doing my own cleaning.

entry.tran: 不会受到（批评或怀疑）；超乎…之所及
entry.def: If someone is above criticism or suspicion, they cannot be criticized or suspected because of their good qualities or their position.

example.ex: The Queen remains above criticism, apart from the issue of her tax liability...
example.tran: 抛开她的纳税义务不谈，女王一直无可指摘。

example.ex: He was a respected academic and above suspicion.
example.tran: 他是位受人尊敬的学者，根本没有嫌疑。

entry.def: If you value one person or thing above any other, you value them more or consider that they are more important.

example.ex: ...his tendency to put the team above everything...
example.tran: 他把这个团队看得比什么都重要的倾向

example.ex: I want to be honest, honest above everything else.
example.tran: 我想要做到诚实，一切以诚实为上。

means.word_mean: 1. appearing earlier in the same text;
2. in or to a place that is higher

auth_sentence.content: Above in the velvet vault the stars burned hot.
auth_sentence.res_content: Above in the velvet vault the stars burned hot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Above in the velvet vault the stars burned hot.

auth_sentence.content: Above the church a vulture specked the blue sky.
auth_sentence.res_content: Above the church a vulture specked the blue sky.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Above the church a vulture specked the blue sky.

auth_sentence.content: It fails to rise above its dated britpop roots.
auth_sentence.res_content: It fails to rise above its dated britpop roots.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It fails to rise above its dated britpop roots.

Sentence.sentence: However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should
But economists who study the relationship between money and happiness have consistently found that, above a certain income, the two do not reliably correlate.
Raise their heads above the water.

sentences.en: The aeroplane was flying a few feet above the sea.
sentences.cn: 飞机正在距海面几英尺的低空飞行。

sentences.en: The chorus was seated above the orchestra.
sentences.cn: 合唱队的座位高于乐队席。

means.word_mean: (表示方向)在…的另一侧; 在…往北

sentences.en: The water is smoother above the dam.
sentences.cn: 坝的另一边水面平静些。

sentences.en: The greatest part of Europe is situated above the 45th degree of Northern Latitude.
sentences.cn: 欧洲绝大部分地区位于北纬45度以北。

means.word_mean: (表示比较)优于, 胜于; 较…更为; 高出

sentences.en: Because of her beauty, she has managed to marry above her.
sentences.cn: 由于貌美, 她得以嫁给一个地位比她高的人。

means.word_mean: (表示环境)处在…之中; 逆着, 透过

sentences.en: The captain's voice was heard above the din.
sentences.cn: 透过一片嘈杂声听到了船长的说话声。

means.word_mean: (表示程度)超过, 超越; 为…所不及

sentences.en: You can't expect to succeed if you attempt tasks above your ability.
sentences.cn: 如果你要做能力达不到的事, 就别指望成功。

sentences.en: A lieutenant colonel ranks above a major.
sentences.cn: 陆军中校比少校级别高。

means.word_mean: (表示否定)不受…的影响; 不至于

sentences.en: He is above meanness and deceit.
sentences.cn: 他不至于搞卑鄙和欺骗行为。

sentences.en: He was quite above owing his meal to the request of a little girl.
sentences.cn: 他绝不屑于应一个小姑娘的邀请去吃饭。

sentences.en: Above two hundred people attended the meeting.
This is a military meeting for captains and above.
sentences.cn: 这是一个由上尉及上尉以上军官参加的军事会议。

sentences.en: As is stated above, this principle applies to all cases.
sentences.cn: 如前文所讲, 这一原则适合所有案例。

jushi.english: You can't expect to succeed if you attempt tasks above your ability.
jushi.chinese: 如果你要做能力达不到的事,就别指望成功。
这本书超出了我的理解力。

jushi.english: Because of her beauty, she has managed to marry above her.
jushi.chinese: 由于貌美,她得以嫁给一个地位比她高的人。
